Package model

Class MEllipse

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.MShape
      • model.MEllipse

  • public class MEllipse
extends MShape
    represents an Ellipse. A Ellipse is a circular based shape with a minimum radius which is half of the height and a maximum Radius which is half of the width. GP2 EA4
    Version:
    1.0 14 Nov 2018
    Author:
    Verena Kauth
